browse.where: PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.ClientCompany = '$S{ClientCompany}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.P_PositioningRelation= '$C{PositioningRelation.Positioning}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.P_IsCompetitorCompany='N' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.P_EntityType='$C{PositioningEntityType.Competitor}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.P_Status='$C{PositioningStatus.Enabled}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.PC_PositioningRelation= '$C{PositioningRelation.Positioning}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.PC_IsCompetitorCompany='Y' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.PC_EntityType='$C{PositioningEntityType.Competitor}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.PC_Status='$C{PositioningStatus.Enabled}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.CM_PositioningRelation= '$C{PositioningRelation.CompetitiveMessaging}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.CM_IsCompetitorCompany='Y' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.CM_EntityType='$C{PositioningEntityType.Competitor}' and PositioningAllByCompetitorByIndustryReportView.CM_Status='$C{PositioningStatus.Enabled}'
